issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Testing Infrastructure
components.description: Tracks issues with tests and testing infrastructure.

fields.summary: Extra '\0' characters in the output, when SeparatedValuesOutputFormat is used and the quoting is disabled

comments.body:
When unquotedCsvPreference is generated use SelectiveCsvEncoder without any column to encode.
Add a qtest to test the case

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12867135/HIVE-16625.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12867764 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

+1 looks good to me.
note: this test {{insert_overwrite_local_directory_1.q}} seems like something which writes files and directories outside its {{target}} directory...namely; it overwrites {{data/files/local_src_table_1}} - and it pollutes the project workspace after execution...

+1 as well. The change looks good. 

[~pvary] Are you trying to address the test issue in this patch or would like to do it in a followup?

I would prefer to do it in the followup, since it is not related.

What do you think?

Thanks,
Peter
Sounds good. I will commit for you then.
Hive 3.0.0 has been released so closing this jira.
